name: SuperHeroBattle
0:
”Alexa, open Super Hero Battle”
”Alexa, start Super Hero Battle”
”Alexa, launch Super Hero Battle”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: super hero battle
des:
Super Hero Battle helps you create battles between your favourite superheroes! Choose a power item and a favourite superhero and get ready to start!
If your guess is correct, and your favourite superhero wins the battle, you will get points.
Available power items are:
- Intelligence
- Strength
- Speed
- Durability
- Power
- Combat

Have fun!
Please if you have any questions or suggestions send us an email to voice@pentatech.com.au
And if you like this skill don't forget to give us some stars!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
